channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: “Won’t get fooled again”
item.description: Alas, we probably will. Recurring scams, hustles and deceptions work because we’re eager to be fooled by them. Vaporware, false deadlines, fake budget...

item.title: UFC Edmonton Results: Bonus Winners And Highlights
item.description: I’d forgotten how good Brandon Moreno can be in the Octagon. He reminded us how good he can be with a masterful performance against Amir Albazi.
